name: SCI-BI
description:
SCI-BI works with some of the best Architects in the Information Technology domain, who not only design the system, but also act as Advisory for constant improvement of your IT practice. So when you choose to work with SCI-BI or one of its associates, you can be rest assured that your project is in the safest hands and the clearest minds who know how to get the job done.
At SCI-BI we believe, “Cleaner Data Drives Accurate Reporting”. We insist on Data Quality at all stages of our Integration process. Our methodology involves thorough scrutiny of data to report the right data, capturing erroneous data at early stages, and push very hard towards “Single Version of the Truth”.
Insight360 is Our full spectrum analytics offering on Azure cloud
https://goo.gl/4aiW5j
PTC Authorized System Integrator for Industrial IOT platform - Thingworx
Zoho Authorized CRM Partner
Skills :
Big-Data Engineering & ETL Hadoop, Spark - Azure HDInsights, Azure Data Lake store, Databricks, AWS EMR, AWS Glue, Hortonworks, Cloudera,MapR, Informatica Power Center, Big-Data Edition, Talend DI, Big-Data Edition, SSIS, Azure Data Factory
IOT - Azure IOT, AWS IOT, Thignworx
Analytics : Azure ML - Workbench, Studio, Spark MLlib,Tableau, Power BI, Qlik
Cloud/PaaS : Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure
